name: ATTRACT THEM
description:
Under darkness, nothing is visible. By utilizing the one light that you have equipped, the world can be explored and puzzle pieces reveal themselves. Under certain conditions, including color matching, spherical enemies aim to creep towards you. While the world cycles through colors, your goal is to get to the exit. *

[ Controls ]
| WASD -  Movement |
| Mouse - Look around | 
| R - reset level |

*Bonus level & mode included

Made for the Extra Credits Game Jam 3
